name: Smashylands (Early Prototype)
description:
Smashylands is my first and only prototype for a destructible environment similar to those sandbox elements you'd find in games like Terraria and Minecraft. You can dig deeper down and may just find yourself some ore which in turn will help you along a path of linear progression

Everything that is working and shown in this prototype is still a work in progress and everything is subject to change, please leave me any bug reports / suggestions in either the comments below of this game or my discord provided. Or, if you're pretty savvy with Construct you can send me a direct message over discord (siegeholm#2804) and work out some things left on my to-do list. Overall I really hope you enjoy my first prototype!
